suncertify.gui
Class SavedConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.gui.SavedConfiguration

public class SavedConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

Provides read/write access to the user's saved configuration parameters on disk, so that next time they connect, they can be offered the same configuration parameters as a default.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String DATABASE_LOCATION
          key in Properties indicating that the value will be the database location.
static java.lang.String SERVER_ADDRESS
          key in Properties indicating that the value will be the RMI Registry server address.
static java.lang.String SERVER_PORT
          key in Properties indicating that the value will be the port the RMI Registry listens on.

setParameter

public void setParameter(java.lang.String parameterName,
                         java.lang.String parameterValue)
Updates the saved parameters with the new values. Always saves the new values immediately - this means we will be saving the properties file far more often than we need when we enter the first set of values, however once the initial set of values have been entered, they should rarely (if ever) be changed. So this will not be a problem most of the time. Doing it this way means that the user of this class need not explictly save the parameters.

Parameters:
parameterName - the name of the parameter.
parameterValue - the value to be stored for the parameter
